channel.title: How do I get rid of a password encryption?
channel.description: On all my player files their password is encrypted with an md5. And I dont know how to reverse it. Any help?

item.title: How do I get rid of a password encryption?
item.dc:creator: @Sinned Sinned
item.description:
@Sinned wrote:

If you want to change things/view things from player’s character files then use lines of code in your server to execute the request, otherwise, if you want to test players passwords with their email accounts (because let’s face it, decrypting player’s passwords produces no other “benefit” other than hacking), then you’re on your own.

A player’s password should remain private, even to administrators.

Read full topic
item.source: How do I get rid of a password encryption?
